items.text: A Psalm or Song for the sons of Korah.
items.plainText: A Psalm or Song for the sons of Korah.

items.text: His foundation is in the holy mountains.
items.plainText: His foundation is in the holy mountains.

items.text: The LORD loveth the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.
items.plainText: The LORD loveth the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.

items.text: Glorious things are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.
items.plainText: Glorious things are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.

items.text: I will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to them that know me: behold Philistia, and Tyre, with Ethiopia; this man was born there.
items.plainText: I will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to them that know me: behold Philistia, and Tyre, with Ethiopia; this man was born there.

items.text: And of Zion it shall be said, This and that man was born in her: and the highest himself shall establish her.
items.plainText: And of Zion it shall be said, This and that man was born in her: and the highest himself shall establish her.

items.text: The LORD shall count, when he writeth up the people, that this man was born there. Selah.
items.plainText: The LORD shall count, when he writeth up the people, that this man was born there. Selah.

items.text: As well the singers as the players on instruments shall be there: all my springs are in thee.
items.plainText: As well the singers as the players on instruments shall be there: all my springs are in thee.
